shortdesc.ph: Sets whether the SDK's playback device follows the system default playback device.
Sets whether the audio playback device used by the SDK follows the system default playback device.
Sets whether the audio playback device used by the SDK follows the system default audio playback device.

section.note: This method is applicable to Windows and macOS only.

plentry.pd:
Whether to follow the system default playback device:
: Follow. When the system default playback device changes, the SDK immediately switches the playback device.
: Do not follow. The SDK switches to the system default playback device only when the current playback device is removed.

Whether to follow the system default audio playback device:
: Follow. When the system default playback device changes, the SDK immediately switches the audio playback device.
: Do not follow. The SDK switches to the system default playback device only when the current audio playback device is removed.

Whether to follow the system default audio playback device:
: Follow. When the system default audio playback device changes, the SDK immediately switches to it.
: Do not follow. The SDK switches to the system default audio playback device only when the current device used by the SDK is removed.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
